column2: "〔<%me>〕〔There is something〕〔I want to ask you〕"
"〔If you say justice〕〔There is nothing more〕〔However〕〔Why does it〕〔Appear to be an〕〔Obligation?〕"
"〔Yet〕〔This question〕〔Does not seem〕〔To be something you can answer〕"
"〔Why I am〕〔Of the Hi clan?〕〔Yes〕〔It is of this nature〕"
"〔Still〕〔I wonder〕〔On what exactly〕〔Was this obligation〕〔Founded on?〕"
"〔Us Dragonkin〕〔Use legend as a pillar〕〔So what〕〔Is the pillar〕〔ARKS is〕〔Based on?〕"
